mainText:
I am deeply saddened by the news of Steve's passing. He was truly a  
visionary in the field. He built an exceptional company that I have  
been loyal to for many years. I hope his innovative legacy will live  
on through the future of Apple.

Thank you Steve for following your dreams and bringing revolutionary  
products to our homes. I know this is a tragic day for Steve's family  
and loved ones, but it is also devastating to the Apple customers  
(like myself) who took pride in the innovation of Apple products.
author: Crystal
